titles: A letter writ by Mijn Heer Fagel, pensioner of Holland, to Mr. James Stewart, advocate giving an account of the Prince and Princess of Orange's thoughts concerning the repeal of the Test, and penal laws.
author: Fagel, Gaspar, 1634-1688.
Stewart, James, Sir, 1635-1713.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
keywords: Dissenters, Religious --  Legal status, laws, etc. --  England --  Early works to 1800.
